scripts.codegen: rm -rf src/eth-sdk/abis && rm -rf src/generated && pnpm eth-sdk -p src/eth-sdk
scripts.build: rm -rf build && pnpm tsc -m commonjs --outDir build/commonjs && pnpm tsc -m esnext --outDir build/module && cp -r src/generated build/module/generated && cp -r src/generated build/commonjs/generated
